guide.introduction: This guide is a bit more advanced than the normal Arduino guide. Specifically, we will be re-flashing the firmware on the Atmega328p (The Arduino's Processor) to a firmware called "grbl".
guide.introduction_rendered:
This guide is a bit more advanced than the normal Arduino guide. Specifically, we will be re-flashing the firmware on the Atmega328p (The Arduino's Processor) to a firmware called "grbl".

Tools
  • AVR ISP Programmer
  • Arduino grblShield
  • Arduino microcontroller
  • Fishing Line
  • NEMA 23 Bipolar Stepper Motor
guide.summary: In this guide I will show you how to create a two axis Drawbot.  This drawbot will consume Gcode commands, translate them into a "drawbot format" and then go to work drawing.
guide.title: Make an Arduino Drawbot

tools.notes: Any ISP should work.  However the AVR ISP MKII is the best supported.
